title: Blue Essance After A Game ?
body: Not sure where I should have posted this but asking @RiotGames for BE after a game is asking for asking for help right ?  Anyways , me and another kid in a match were saying to each other how they should give you BE ( even a little ) after a match, now ive been playing for long hours of the day , around 8-10 and everyday since pre-season and I'm only level 37 and I get really bad stuff when I hit a new level like for example ill get "Annie" that's 90 BE , if it takes a long time to level up and I'm only getting stuff for 90-270 BE its really not worth it . And its usually 2-5 champs il get in a champion capsule . Please give us even if its only like 30 BE after a game cause it really adds up , it will take forever to buy the champs I want. Thank you -

replies.body: We're going to be making a small change to the first win of the day missions to include about 50 BE each time you complete it, but we're definitely still open to feedback and other suggestions. Those would be best left on [**Cactopus's thread here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments) where they can keep all of these conversations in one spot so they don't miss anything!
